backend_llm_notes: GPT-5 via Cursor Agent Mode - Advanced reasoning and instruction following
original_prompt: Clear my Thursday afternoon. Update my RSVPs and help me reschedule my meetings to another time and show me as {status}.

gutts.name: Time Block Specification Parsing
gutts.capability: Interpret 'Thursday afternoon' into specific date/time range
gutts.user_goal: System knows exactly which time block to clear
gutts.evidence: Parsed to: Next Thursday (Nov 13, 2025) 12:00 PM - 6:00 PM

gutts.name: Affected Meetings Identification
gutts.capability: Find all meetings within the target time block
gutts.evidence: Found 4 meetings in Thursday afternoon: 1pm Product Review, 2pm Team Sync, 3:30pm 1:1, 5pm Customer Call

gutts.name: RSVP Decline Execution
gutts.capability: Decline all meetings in the blocked time
gutts.evidence: Updated RSVP status to 'Declined' for 4 meetings with automated message

gutts.name: Alternative Slot Finding
gutts.capability: For each meeting, identify alternative time slots
gutts.user_goal: Find times when same attendees can meet
gutts.evidence: Found alternative slots: Product Review → Mon 2pm, Team Sync → Wed 10am, 1:1 → Fri 3pm, Customer Call → Wed 4pm

gutts.name: Meeting Rescheduling Proposals
gutts.capability: Send reschedule requests with proposed new times
gutts.evidence: Sent reschedule proposals to organizers with new time suggestions and explanation

gutts.name: Calendar Status Update
gutts.capability: Set user's status/availability for the blocked time
gutts.user_goal: Others see user as unavailable during blocked time
gutts.evidence: Set free/busy status to '{status}' (e.g., 'Out of Office', 'Busy', 'Do Not Disturb') for Thursday afternoon

gutts.name: Focus Time Block Creation
gutts.capability: Create placeholder event for the blocked time
gutts.user_goal: Visual representation of blocked time on calendar
gutts.evidence: Created calendar event 'Focus Time' Thu 12-6pm with '{status}' visibility

gutts.name: Action Summary & Confirmation
gutts.capability: Report what was done (declined X, rescheduled Y, blocked Z hours)
gutts.user_goal: Understand complete outcome of the request
gutts.evidence: Summary: 'Cleared Thursday afternoon (6 hours). Declined 4 meetings. Proposed reschedules sent. Status set to {status}.'

notes: Generated by GPT-5 - Matches reference decomposition of 8 GUTTs
